testcase.name: Valid Payee
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on Fund Transfer Page.....................................passed When he enters "Jim" as payee name..........................................passed And he enters "100" as amount...............................................passed And he submits request for Fund Transfer....................................passed Then ensure the fund transfer is complete with "$100 transferred successfully to Jim!!" message.passed

testcase.name: Invalid conditions
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on Fund Transfer Page.....................................passed When he enters "Tim" as payee name..........................................passed And he enters "100000" as amount............................................passed And he submits request for Fund Transfer....................................passed Then ensure a transaction failure "Transfer failed!! account cannot be overdrawn" is displayed.passed
